.This can help to diagnose CJD in people who already show the clinical symptoms of the disease. This test is much easier and safer than a brain biopsy. The false positive rate is about 5 to 10 percent. Scientists are working to develop this test for use in commercial laboratories. They are also working to develop other tests for this disorder.",GARD,Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease
What are the treatments for Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease ?,"How might Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease be treated? There is no treat
